entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
